scripts.generate:typescript: bun quicktype -s schema temp-schema.json --lang typescript --top-level NetworksRegistryElement --out packages/typescript/src/types.ts
scripts.generate:rust: bun quicktype -s schema temp-schema.json --lang rust --top-level NetworksRegistry --density normal --visibility public --derive-debug --derive-clone --out packages/rust/src/types.rs
scripts.generate:go: bun quicktype -s schema temp-schema.json --lang go --top-level NetworksRegistry --package registry --out packages/golang/types.go
scripts.generate: bun generate:prepare && bun generate:typescript && bun generate:rust && bun generate:go && bun generate:cleanup
